item.description:
TC: Cindy 617-987-8778 ginger@rcn.com

EVENT: There?s lots more to the Charles River than that little stretch between B.U. and the Hatch Shell!!! Our slow-paced ride [10-12 mph] will take us through Brighton, Boston, Cambridge, Watertown ? approximately 14-16 FLAT miles. We will ride together as a group and be on a bike path for 95% of the ride. This ride is more of a fun urban exploration rather than a heavy-duty aerobic workout. Cold temps will NOT cancel [please layer up and make sure one layer is fleece] but RAIN will. HELMETS ARE MANDATORY FOR THIS RIDE. Bring water, a bike in good working order w/fully inflated tires, and a fun/friendly attitude.

RSVP: Mandatory
MEET: 10:00 am at TC's home, ample on street parking. Address/directions will be given to those who RSVP.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: BIKE RIDE ALONG THE CHARLES [AND WORK OFF THE EXCESS T-DAY DINNER]
